generated_description: mirize co. ltd. is a company based in chiba, japan, specializing in the replacement and sale of gas water heaters from brands such as rinno, nobil, and paroma. the company offers a range of products including wall-mounted, freestanding, and adjacent installation water heaters, as well as heat pump systems. provides comprehensive services including installation, after-sales support, and long-term warranties. the company serves various regions including tokyo, chiba, kanagawa, saitama, and kyoto, aiming to offer competitive pricing and reliable service.
